item.description:
WILLKOMMEN!!!

Welcome to the East Side Restaurant in New Britain,CT where the spirit of Germany lives on. October is, of course, the month of the annual celebration of OKTOBERFEST and they are doing it up right, here at The East Side. Step inside and you will be immediately enchanted by the warm Bavarian atmosphere and friendly staff outfitted in traditional German attire.

The aroma of hearty German dishes will stimulate your appetite and take you back to the essence of good old fashioned family dining. This restaurant prides itself on a unique dining experience highlighting German culture and is entertaining for all ages. Come join us at The East Side Restaurant and celebrate OKTOBERFEST with us! Sample a taste of the OLD WORLD here...which promises a German experience in food, bier and culture!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on the table/ ask for Terri Bruno's table

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: OKTOBERFEST at the East Side Restaurant!!!
